name: Thick-Arrow
description: Flat is Justice ], Medium is Premium ), Oppai is truth OO, Thick Thighs saves lives ()() ::: all size makes the Bone rise B=>

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

OWNER_ID.description: ID or Username of the Bot Owner

DATABASE_URI.description: mongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com.

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot (your id).

DEF_THUMB_NAIL_VID_S.description: default thumbnail to be used in the videos. Incase, youtube-dl is unable to find a thumbnail.

CHUNK_SIZE.description: chunk size that should be used with requests

HTTP_PROXY.description: proxy for accessing youtube-dl in GeoRestricted Areas. Get your own proxy from https://github.com/rg3/youtube-dl/issues/1091#issuecomment-230163061

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode
